body:
The message error:
Error: Error initializing wallet database environment

Tested on versions:
 0.8.5 and 0.8.6

OS:
Windows 2003 Server
(however on Linux had the same error if I remember well)

Situation:
I'm trying to run Bitcoin-qt or Bitcoind with data dir localized on Network Drive (Z:\ua in my case, it's an empty folder).

Command:
bitcoind.exe -datadir=Z:\ua
Error: Error initializing wallet database environment Z:\ua!
